title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
We are seeking a talented Senior Business Analyst to become a key player in our team. In this role, you will be responsible for analyzing business needs, managing requirements, and collaborating with stakeholders to optimize processes and systems. Your expertise in business analysis and insurance solutions will directly contribute to the success of our projects.

Responsibilities



Act as a bridge between stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and expectation management
Develop, document, and maintain essential business analysis artifacts
Strategically plan and execute business analysis activities
Conduct comprehensive requirements analysis and oversee change management processes
Identify opportunities for process enhancements and provide actionable recommendations
Partner with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project execution
Assess current business analysis methodologies and suggest areas for improvement
Be available for occasional late meetings when required



Requirements



A minimum of 3 years of experience in business analysis
Strong stakeholder management and communication skills
Proficiency in documenting BA artifacts and planning business analysis activities
Deep understanding of requirements analysis and change management
Hands-on experience with EIS ClaimCore v12
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
English proficiency at B2+ level
Knowledge of insurance industry processes



Nice to have



Experience working with EIS Solutions
A proven track record in enhancing business analysis workflows
Ability to tackle complex business challenges with innovative solutions
Experience in facilitating late meetings when necessary

International projects with top brands
